text.tspan: “[...] The municipalities of Saltdal, Fauske and Bodø are
considering establishing a joint planning of the fjord system. In
order to ensure good and comprehensive solutions for the area in
the long term, it is necessary that further new use and
development in the sea area wait on a new, pending, joint plan for
Fauske approximately owns 40% of the Skjerstadfjord.
The pink areas are current or planned aquacutlure sites
